ACTORCREATOR.TITLE: Actor Creator
ACTORCREATOR.DESCRIPTION: This dialog will allow you to create a preconfigured actor using art assets contained in the Duelyst Sprites module.

PRESET.LABEL: Preset
PRESET.HINT: Select the character to use to create an actor

ACTORCREATOR.HASSPRITEANIMATION: This preset has a configuration for Sprite Animations
ACTORCREATOR.HASTHEATREINSERT: This preset has an image appropriate for Theatre Inserts
